    <facet>

      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_99888</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99888</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Particles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Particules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Partículas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Particelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μόρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Partículas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows what Democritus meant when he said that matter is made up of very small pieces called particles.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Democritus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Particle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, welches Democritus 
bedeutete, als er sagte, daß Stoff die sehr kleinen Stücke besteht, 
die Partikel genannt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre quel Democritus a 
signifié quand il a dit que la matière se compose des morceaux très
petits appelés les particules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que Democritus 
significou quando disse que a matéria está composta das partes muito
pequenas chamadas partículas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che Democritus ha 
significato quando ha detto che la materia si compone di parti molto 
piccole chiamate particelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ποιο Democritus σήμανε 
πότε είπε ότι το θέμα αποτελείται από τα πολύ μικρά κομμάτια 
αποκαλούμενα μόρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra qué Democritus 
significó cuando él dijo que la materia está compuesta de los 
pedazos muy pequeños llamados las partículas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Democritus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Particule</string>
          </keyword>
